Question
========

We want to test the null hypothesis that two population variances are equal and use the F-test to do so. The sample data are as following:ÃŠ. Sample 1: n = 6, mean = 75, sd = 13. Sample 2: n = 9, mean = 85, sd = 27. The value of the test quantity, and the conclusion are

Answerlist
----------

* F = 2.08, reject the null hypothesis
* F = 2.08, do not reject the null hypothesis
* F = 4.31, reject the null hypothesis

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* F = 2.08, reject the null hypothesis: Incorrect
* F = 2.08, do not reject the null hypothesis: Incorrect
* F = 4.31, reject the null hypothesis: Incorrect
* F = 4.31, do not reject the null hypothesis: Correct
